posts.title: Axios
posts.body: An npm package used to fetch api data. I need to learn this ASAP!

posts.title: JavaScript
posts.body: I love JavaScript. It's such an amazing programming language. I'm probably going to become a MERN stack developer.

posts.title: useContext
posts.body: useContext cleans up your app. It puts all the "data"/ props into one file to be accessed throughout the application.
